channel.title: Ekky Defa Rizkyan
channel.description: Recent content on Ekky Defa Rizkyan

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi Im Ekky, a Senior Site Reliability Engineer.

I’m a lifelong learner, a systems thinker, and a builder at heart.

My journey in tech has always been driven by curiosity. I don’t just work with systems, I obsess over how they behave, how they break, and how to make them better, faster, and more resilient. Whether it’s infrastructure, automation, security, observability, or developer tooling, I find joy in diving deep into complexity and emerging with clarity, structure, and solutions that make a real impact.

item.title: Professional Experience
item.description:
Quipper | Senior Site Reliability Engineer

Remote, 2022 — Present

Focused on improving infrastructure reliability, developer experience, and platform efficiency across distributed environments.

Key Contributions

  • Built and maintained reliable infrastructure using cloud platforms, SaaS, and open-source tooling
  • Automated infrastructure management using IaC workflows
  • Improved CI/CD pipelines, application reliability, and resource efficiency
  • Enhanced observability, troubleshooting, and systems cost-efficiency
  • Collaborated closely with development teams to increase deployment velocity

Notable Achievements

  • Migrated CI/CD from CircleCI → GitHub Actions w/ self-hosted runners, saving $6K/month
  • Boosted developer productivity by 83% using workflow analytics and optimization
  • Improved service availability by migrating public endpoints to CloudFront + WAF for DDoS protection
  • Built an AI-powered documentation copilot using GPT-4 + Azure to reduce SRE support load
  • Designed and implemented a performance testing platform that reduced execution time from 2 hours → 15 minutes and saved $60K/year in infra cost + significant operational effort

eFishery | DevOps Engineer

Remote, 2021 — 2023
